GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article by its ID.

article.author: Darth Vader
article.title: How to start an Empire
article.body: This is part two of a series on establishing an empire from a single space station...

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments for a specific article

params.article_id: The ID of the article for which to retrieve comments

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a comment to an article
